Sentencas: The energy demand is growing at a fast rate around the globe.
Titulo: Sliding mode based feedback linearizing controller for grid connected multiple fuel cells scenario

Sentencas: The conventional power generation technologies may not meet the environmental constraints.
Titulo: Sliding mode based feedback linearizing controller for grid connected multiple fuel cells scenario

Sentencas: Hence, a Solid Oxide Fuel Cell based power generation unit is considered as distributed generating source here, in this paper.
Titulo: Sliding mode based feedback linearizing controller for grid connected multiple fuel cells scenario

Sentencas: An integrated operation of two units is done with a master-slave control strategy.
Titulo: Sliding mode based feedback linearizing controller for grid connected multiple fuel cells scenario

Sentencas: Voltage source converters are used to interface nonconventional energy sources with grid, in general.
Titulo: Sliding mode based feedback linearizing controller for grid connected multiple fuel cells scenario

Sentencas: However, these systems are highly nonlinear and coupled systems.
Titulo: Sliding mode based feedback linearizing controller for grid connected multiple fuel cells scenario

Sentencas: Hence conventional PI controller will not give satisfactory performance for changing operating conditions and uncertain load changes.
Titulo: Sliding mode based feedback linearizing controller for grid connected multiple fuel cells scenario

Sentencas: Hence, feedback linearization scheme has been formulated, which uses nonlinear transformation by means of diffeomorphism mapping to convert nonlinear models into linear models.
Titulo: Sliding mode based feedback linearizing controller for grid connected multiple fuel cells scenario

Sentencas: Sliding mode control technique has been incorporated in the feedback linearized control to address the issues of uncertainty and to add robustness to the control algorithm.
Titulo: Sliding mode based feedback linearizing controller for grid connected multiple fuel cells scenario

Sentencas: The developed control algorithm is tested for different dispatches, load uncertainties, decoupling of control variables and finally the variable grid frequency within a small band.
Titulo: Sliding mode based feedback linearizing controller for grid connected multiple fuel cells scenario
